changeSet.sql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_friends_user_peer_unique ON user_friends(user_id,peer_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_profile_uniq ON user_profile(user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_email_uniq ON user(email)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX video_content_url_uniq ON video_content(url)
